job.title: System Engineer
job.description:
Job Title: System Engineer (Office 365, Powershell Scripting & Active Directory)Location: San Jose, CA or PST/West CoastDuration: 6 Months&nbsp;Duties:1. User Support and Development- Two parts: Scripting automations and answering user ticket2. Tickets can range from automation requests to assisting with O365 access.&nbsp;Experience:1. O3652. Powershell Scripting3. Active Directory&nbsp;Nice to Have:  - OKTA   
  - Google Workspace   
  - Microsoft Technologies   
  - Working in Active Directory   
&nbsp;Tools and Programs:  - O365 – Suite of Microsoft applications – Outlook, Excel, Word, etc.   
  - PowerShell Language for automation – Scripting   
  - Active Directory Experience&nbsp;.   
   &nbsp;If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume&nbsp;at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com&nbsp;or call me at&nbsp;(925) 218-2347. Looking forward to hearing from you!
